channel.title: Queues on Systology
channel.description: Recent content in Queues on Systology

item.title: Notification System
item.description: Design of a high-throughput notification service supporting push, email, and SMS with prioritization, rate limiting, and delivery tracking.

item.title: Real-Time Analytics Pipeline
item.description: Scalable real-time pipeline to ingest and process high-volume user event streams for immediate analytics and dashboards; handles late arrivals and fault tolerance.
